metadata.name: AWSCBVaultExtension
metadata.title: Catesta - SecretManagement extension vault module template for AWS CodeBuild
metadata.description: Scaffolds a new PowerShell SecretManagement extension vault module project intended for CI/CD workflow using AWS CodeBuild
metadata.author: Jake Morrison

parameter.name: ModuleName
parameter.prompt: Enter the name of the extension vault module. (It is a community best practice that vault project names start with: SecretManagement. Example: SecretManagement.MyVault)

parameter.name: Description
parameter.prompt: Enter a description for the extension vault module

parameter.name: Version
parameter.prompt: Enter the version number of the extension vault module

parameter.name: Changelog
parameter.prompt: Would you like to generate a Changelog file?

choice.label: &Changelog
choice.help: Adds a Changelog file.

choice.label: &None
choice.help: Does not add a Changelog file.

parameter.name: RepoType
parameter.prompt: Where will this project be hosted?

choice.label: &GitHub
choice.help: Hosted on GitHub.

choice.label: &AWS CodeCommit
choice.help: Hosted on AWS CodeCommit.

parameter.name: License
parameter.prompt: Select a License for your module. (Help deciding: https://choosealicense.com/)

choice.label: &MIT
choice.help: Adds a MIT License file.

choice.label: &Apache
choice.help: Adds an Apache License file.

choice.label: &GNU
choice.help: Adds a GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE file.

choice.label: &ISC
choice.help: Adds an ISC License file.

choice.label: &None
choice.help: Does not add a License file.

parameter.name: COC
parameter.prompt: Would you like to generate a Code of Conduct file?

choice.label: &conduct
choice.help: Adds a Code of Conduct file.

choice.label: &None
choice.help: Does not add a Changelog file.

parameter.name: Contribute
parameter.prompt: Would you like to generate a Contributing guidelines file?

choice.label: &Contribute
choice.help: Adds a Contributing file.

choice.label: &None
choice.help: Does not add a Contributing file.

parameter.name: CodingStyle
parameter.prompt: Would you like to specify a coding style for the project?

choice.label: &Stroustrup
choice.help: Sets Stroustrup as the preferred coding style.

choice.label: &OTBS
choice.help: Sets OTBS as the preferred coding style.

choice.label: &Allman
choice.help: Sets Allman as the preferred coding style.

choice.label: &None
choice.help: No coding style is set for the project.

parameter.name: S3Bucket
parameter.prompt: Enter S3 bucket name to download needed PS modules from S3 location. Leave blank to DL modules from PSGallery.

choice.label: &Windows - PowerShell
choice.help: Adds a powershell focused buildspec.yml for Windows CodeBuild.

choice.label: &Core (Windows)- pwsh
choice.help: Adds a pwsh focused buildspec.yml for Windows CodeBuild.

choice.label: &Linux - pwsh
choice.help: Adds a pwsh focused buildspec.yml for Linux CodeBuild.

choice.label: &None
choice.help: Does not add a buildspec file.

parameter.name: Pester
parameter.prompt: Which version of Pester would you like to use?

choice.help: Pester version 5
Pester version 4
